reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 196/16: COUNCIL COMPOSITION - REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF HALTON
reg_info.reg_name_text: COUNCIL COMPOSITION - REGIONAL MUNICIPALITY OF HALTON

content.content: 1. The Regional Municipality of Halton may exercise its power under section 218 of the Act to change the composition of its council by, (a) increasing the number of members from the Town of Milton from three to five; and (b) increasing the number of members from the Town of Oakville from seven to eight.
content.raw_html:
1. The Regional Municipality of Halton may exercise its power under section 218 of the Act to change the composition of its council by,

(a) increasing the number of members from the Town of Milton from three to five; and

(b) increasing the number of members from the Town of Oakville from seven to eight.

content.content:
2. Omitted
(provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
